metadata.title: CVE-2024-42095 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  serial: 8250_omap: Implementation of Errata i2310  As per Errata i2310[0], Erroneous timeout can be triggered, if this Erroneous interrupt is not cleared then it may leads to storm of interrupts, therefore apply Errata i2310 solution.  [0] https://www.ti.com/lit/pdf/sprz536 page 23
